title: Serve an Eviction Notice for Non-Payment
description: A tenant has failed to pay rent for two months despite warnings. The property manager must begin the formal eviction process.

tasks.description: Verify the tenant's payment history and confirm the total amount of unpaid rent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has accurate records of the delinquency.

tasks.description: Generate the appropriate legal notice for non-payment of rent as required by state law (e.g., '3-Day Pay or Quit').
tasks.expected_outcome: A legally compliant eviction notice is created.

tasks.description: Arrange for the notice to be legally served to the tenant by a professional process server.
tasks.expected_outcome: The notice is served and proof of service is obtained.
